title: Does an online certificate from an accredited school hold a weight? - Quora

response.answer_text: Sure does! However, all the basic factors that apply to a campus program apply: Name/ brand of school will give an edge. Was the certificate from a recognized school (Harvard, UPenn, UCLA) or ABC College.What accreditation Is the Cert program ?What area of study was the Cert? Was it in a technical area like coding, paralegal, Accounting, or general skills Management, leadership.Can you demonstrate the skills that were to be achieved after completing the Cert program? Soft skills are harder to demonstrate than hard skills.Additionally, there usually isn’t a mention on the mode of instruction, so study with no fear! Best of luck!
